name: Card Payment Sweden
goal:
The Card Payment Sweden is a business association who has the obligation in the interest of its members to promote its members interest in developing the payment card business in Sweden

The association is open for any bank and/or Financial Institution and operating in Sweden within payment Card industry.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, Single market
euInitiatives:
participating in discussions regard the IF regulation and the PSD2 directive: EBA

follow payment card issues and related
